lead_paragraph: KLEINBERG--Norman C.,marathon runner, Bergdorf cashmeres, slipped off his Rolex before jury trials, 50 gifts for Marcia's 50th--with limousine stops up Madison Avenue, lured us to the Cipriani in Venice, the Taormina in Sicily, sedia di rotelle, the movies, Divino, loyal, fun friend; to Marcia our deep admiration for the courage you exhibited in your extraordinary care of a much-changed Norman these last few difficult years, we salute you. David and Carole Gaunt 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  KLEINBERG, NORMAN C.

David and Carole Gaunt 1/3
